Articles.Content:
I have been busy since I bought this lovely game earlier this week!

Now on to orbital rendevous <3

I would like to thank the developers for creating it, notch for referring me to it, and everyone else here for being awesome.

PS: Driving the rover 20km on the moon because you were careless about aiming because you thought 'Hey, I can just move it later!' is twice as hard as landing it there.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Nice Mun base. Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Admiral Sordid

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Hi!

Welcome... Some nice Munar landings there. Which mod are you using? I did not realize Notch had mentioned KSP. He is so cool, just watched his bafta award. I hope this game progresses like minecraft, I love the massive potential it has.

Thor

Chief engineer Insane Rockets Division

Hi!

Welcome... Some nice Munar landings there. Which mod are you using? I did not realize Notch had mentioned KSP. He is so cool, just watched his bafta award. I hope this game progresses like minecraft, I love the massive potential it has.

Thor

Chief engineer Insane Rockets Division

The little landers are the BACE pack from silisko, I think? Other than that, I just have the rover/truck mod and MechJeb.

He mentioned it on his twitter, which I follow. I\'ve been considering dropping him, though... He never really talks about minecraft anymore since he left the team.

I really look forward to seeing what this game becomes as well. I have a lot of hope for it. I\'d really like to see it cling very closely to sandbox gameplay, though. It\'d be nice to see it get something like empire building mechanics and simulate a developing space economy, rather than a linear progression of missions or goals. AI space programs doing the same thing would be neat too. O_o
